name: HATHASPACE Smart Air Purifiers - True HEPA Air Purifier, Cleaner & Filter for Allergies, Smoke, Pets - Eliminator of 99.9% of Dust, Pet Hair, Odors - HSP001-700 Sq. Ft.
about_this_item: SMART FILTER FOR BEDROOM: Our 4-in-1 filter system targets pollen, dust, pet dander, VOC‚Äôs, smoke, and odors - the H11 HEPA filter captures 99.9% of particles down to 0.3 microns. Our lightweight device is portable, allowing you to improve air quality wherever you need it. Our smart air quality sensor & touch-screen display makes the purifier easy to use & adjust your settings, & also shows air quality information.

EXCEPTIONALLY SILENT: Designed for quiet operation, making it perfect for use in bedrooms and living rooms. The purifier's efficiency in capturing dust and particles - see just how much our air purifiers for home can assist and support the body‚Äôs natural response

EASY TO USE & INSTALLATION: Built to easily identify, access, and change your filters - our purifier comes with multiple fan speed options, enabling you to set the pace of air filtration to suit your needs. Included is a remote to easily adjust the speed to your preference and turn the light on & off when needed - with the auto mode as well to facilitate real-time adjustments based on your room's air quality, & ITS QUIET!

REMOVE ODORS, SMOKE, & VOC'S: Both an air cleaner & odor eliminator, our air purifier features a unique honeycomb activated-carbon filter that absorbs odors, smoke, and VOC‚Äôs. With a state-of-the-art fan and motor, enjoy clean air delivered quietly and efficiently in your home, bedroom, office, kitchen, basement, dorm, apartment, or living room.

FEATURE: Before using the Ionizer/Anion feature, be sure to clear the room of humans and animals and wait 30 minutes after completing before reentry. This feature should be used in unoccupied spaces only. Using the ionizer in an occupied space can cause irritation and injury.

FIND RELIEF: Our purifiers come with a 2-year warranty, award-winning customer support 7 days a week, and the peace of mind with a brand you can trust. You can also find our replacement filters to ensure you have fresh air all year around!

title: Could not be happier with my Hathaspace
content: Absolutely works to clean up the air quality in our 1600 sqft 3 bd 2 ba Florida home. It‚Äôs super quiet. So much so that you second guess if it‚Äôs still pushing air. I added a video with sound to give you an idea of how quiet it really is. With it on the low setting, air is still being driven at a good clip but you can‚Äôt hear it. If you stand above it the fan is blowing strong but it‚Äôs still silent. Medium speed you can hear air movement of sorts. On high you can hear it whispering low. So low that if your sitting on the couch next to it the sounds of the TV are never challenged. As for it creating better air quality, I can assure you it does. After the first 24 hours it was night and day in my home. Since turning this unit on 4 weeks back my nightly routine of allergy medication has gone to the wayside. All of our allergy eye issues along with mild respiratory issues are now gone. The air feels lighter and any of the Cat odors have left the building. I can‚Äôt stand the subtle odor of a cat and I‚Äôve complained to the wife and kids for years about it since I‚Äôm rather over sensitive to smells of animals I‚Äôve never wanted. But I can honestly say now with this Hathaspace Purifier when I return home after being gone all day the air smells and feels fresh. I‚Äôve never been a fan of a home that hints of the smell of pets but the things you‚Äôll live with to make your children happy. Right? Well now this machine has taken the hint of cat odor out of the equation.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2021

title: Verified Purchase

But that‚Äôs just me.

I saw the video and I was like really? I did read ppl's reviews, but I always like to decide for myself. Well, great news I haven't had to use my inhaler, I feel like I'm breathing normally.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: The machine itself is pretty strong, I use it mostly in my bedroom. I did use it once in our oversize kitchen, it definitely made the smell disappear fast from the burnt food that someone left. That part I mean strong is you can hear the power of the machine sucking up the smell and dust around the room really fast. It lights up, red(air not good), orange(it's cleaning the bad air out), and green(you are good to breathe fresh air). The only time you hear noise coming out of the machines is when it's cleaning out the air and dust, otherwise, it's really quiet you can't hear anything but the air on the back of the machine which you can feel the air coming out of. Funny story, I farted and the machine literally activated and suck out the bad smell in my room as it knows, haha I was really impressed! The remote is very small like a garage door opener and quite easy to deal with. I love the light button cause you can press it off and not see any lights from the machine. It is still working unless you decided to turn it off. I really don't use the other features like the timer, speed, anion, and sleep. Everything is kind of automatic and defaulted when you turn it on, it practically runs itself.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2024

title: Asthma and allergy symptoms lessening!
content: For starters I‚Äôve had this little ‚Äúfriend‚Äù of mine going on two years. He runs all day everyday. He is still going strong as I write this. I would not have thought that this machine would only cost $150 be on at all times, still running strong and relieve my allergy and asthma symptoms. I started out in a studio apartment with shared central air. My neighbors were smokers and the first night I slept in my first apartment my nostrils were black and I couldn‚Äôt breathe. So I bought this. Immediately I noticed that when I woke up my sore throat was less noticeable. After only a week of running it, I checked the filters. Boy was I surprised how much dust and crap was floating in the air that was caught. It was like my nostrils times 10. So I used my vacuum to quickly get off the surface dust and kept him running. I always have the sleep mode on so I don‚Äôt have to bother with the lights, but I can always hear him with a very low white noise type sound. It actually helps me sleep. Now that I have moved to a bigger place with my own ac, and air I still have this little magic machine. He stays in my bedroom and I keep him closer to the air vents. Whenever I start to feel stuffy I know it‚Äôs time to change the filters. I usually will vacuum off the surface dust about every 6 weeks and replace the entire filter every 6 months. I know it should ideally be every 3 months but the filters aren‚Äôt cheap. I do love this machine. I even have a dog now and even the hair is trapped in the filter. Highly recommend! By far the best investment I‚Äôve made. If you have allergies, asthma, pets, it‚Äôs well worth every penny. Im actually considering buying a second one for my living room.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021

title: Verified Purchase
content: Works great, solid product
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2024

title: Solid product works great
content: I bought two of these to help with the cat litter dust in my house and just regular dust. I love them. I actually replace the filters every 3 months compared to the recommended every 4 months. I find they work better that way. The noise level is very low. As to how it works for odor? That I don't know. I don't have any stinky stink going on in the house. :o) I can still burn scented candles and smell them. The filters do not remove that scent as the candles burn. Perhaps once the candles are extinguished the filters remove the scent faster? Either way, they did immediately clean the air and make it easier for me to breathe once I turned them on. So that right there is what I was looking for.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Bought one of the SP001 units in September to possibly help with the wildfire smoke seeping into our home. The SP001 unit is fairly light and easy to handle to place it wherever you need it. The sound is somewhat elevated when on "high," but it automatically cycles down after a while and becomes whisper quiet. Also, the ability to shut off the devices light display makes it great for sleeping. The instructions for the unit and remote are simple and easy to follow; and, the remote's features are very good for our homeowner needs.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2020

title: Just what I was looking for.
content: Overall, great pricing, nice features, and easy to install (and reasonably priced) filter elements. For now, we have "upgraded" our filters to "medical grade quality" and are confident that our units are helping keep our home safer. We liked this unit enough to purchase a second one in early November to help increase the specific coverage areas in our home without having to move a single unit around every day
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2020

Any attempt to seek and provide user registration information simply routes back to the initial page - just goes around in a circle. No way to register my purchases, and no other options or windows that help. Have sent three emails (two in late September and one in mid-November seeking help), but no response to date.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2022

title: Great Product But Silent Customer Service Assistance
content: The units we have seem to be working just fine, and we are very happy with them, but so far, "team hathaspace" has not responded to any of our written requests for assistance. Yes, I could call (and wait in line for however long these days) to try to eventually reach a live person, but with all their enclosed and specific printed information and the onscreen pages, that should not be required. On this detail, I am not impressed.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022

title: Verified Purchase
content: I never take the time to write products reviews, however this purifier is truly worth the time if it can help anyone! I have reccomended it to numerous people on a personal level! First off, I spent MONTHS reviewing air purifiers and kept ignoring my desire for one knowing how most make minimal difference or tend to not last. It came to a point that broke down and made the investment with high hopes that it would help my daughter's sinus allergies. I can not begin to tell you how guilty i felt for not buying this product sooner!!! Before saying what it has done for us, I want to mention that my daughter had a cough specifically at night from age 2 on (shes now 6) and also had that constant allergy that never went away. We had tried numerous natural methods as well as medicines and monitoring for a possible  specific illness or allergy and could never find a cure.  We had this unit running 2 days and she was clear!!! I kept waiting for it to come back. It had to be a fluke. Here we are just under 1yr later and she has yet to have the symptoms resurface aside from a couple inevitable minor colds. That in itself has sold me 100%
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024

title: Constant allergies and nightime cough are gone!!!
content: Also to include, for those simply seeking cleaner air and want assurance of the quality of this product aside from how it helped my daughters health, i have been assured over and over with undenying proof! We are currently mid remodel of our home. Without much detail it's old, majorly outdated and is being renovated from a poorly maintained duplex. We've had mold, musty carpet under appliances, etc. Im for one very easily bothered by all of the above and this purifier has made the difference between me having painful, irritated lungs for a couple days after tearing into walls/flooring to completely symptom free. We have had an entire room clouded with drywall dust completely clear within 2 hours and the filters packed with the debri just to simply take them out, vaccum the debri, air them out and good to go again. I've had new filters on hand for over a month now and havnt had to replace them yet!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2020

title: Verified Purchase
content: I have no doubt that you will not regret this purchase!!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: I got these for home and my medical clinic.  I also got one Coway for home and one for my clinic.  When the two brands were placed side by side and exposed to Chlorox wipes, the HathaSpace hiked up to red and the Coway continued to indicate ‚Äúclean air‚Äù.  In fact, I handle patient credit cards with tiny alcohol wipes so as not to have to wash the keyboard every time I take a payment.  I‚Äôm behind the checkout counter and I have the HathaSpace sitting higher up on the other side of the counter.  A few moments after pulling out the alcohol swab, the HathaSpace kicks into yellow/medium setting mode.  I‚Äôve had two patients so impressed with this that they left intending to buy this filter for themselves.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I purchased a used model of this. It was to help out with the insurmountable dust build up we have on a daily basis as well as to control and eliminate the cigarette smoke that comes into our home. The item was slightly scratched when we got it, being used I still wanted to give it the chance. We plugged it in amd it got to work right away. The instructions were simple. Plug it in and press power and let it run on auto or choose your own settings. We let it run on auto. After about 30 min, the cigarette smoke issue was gone. I've given it a couple of days. Normally we have to dust on a daily basis and I havent had to do so in over a week. When I lay in bed, my allergies start kocking in amd that has been a non issue so far as well. Since we have plugged it in, I continue to hold my hand over the fan area to make sure it is on because I cannot believe how quiet it is. When we place it on the highest setting it still makes less noise than any of our tower fans on the low setting. I am so pleased and happy with the product and the immediate results. I will wait about 6 months and provide a more detailed review in the progress as well as photos of the filters.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2022

title: Smaller filter works well
content: The Hathaspace Air Purifier is very quiet at low speed and there is not much discernable noise at the highest speed.  The Air Purifier really works well and it does a great job of filtering the air in a 450 sq.ft room and making it feel fresher.  It has a built in sensor to detect air quality and change the speed of the fan, supported by a color indicator for the current quality of the air.  This Hathaspace Air-Purifier comes with an anion mode feature that works great and also appears that it cleans the room of gnats and other small flying bugs. There are versions, although no longer offered according to Hathaspace, that also come with a UVc feature. There is an "Auto" mode feature that works great and it adjusts the product function to filter the air as necessary which is evident by the change in the color indicator. The filters are easily obtainable and inexpensive.  The filters are easy to replace. Care should be taken to replace the filters as removed or as noted in the User Manual or there would be strange smells coming from the device. The design is pleasing to the eyes and makes for good room furniture.  The remote control is a plus and makes handling the controls very easy since the manual controls are on the side of the unit and are difficult to see and use. It will connect from across a 450 sq.ft  room. The "sleep" feature is great too and turns off all the LED lights and sets the product running at minimum noise.  Hathaspace's customer support is stellar.  Hathaspace's customer service does strive to make things right when there are discrepancies with the product.  This is a very efficient product that does what it is supposed to do at an inexpensive price and very competitive with higher priced products.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: I have a 3000 sq ft house where the living room is open to the second floor. In the afternoons, I would see large and small dust particles and pet hair floating around in the beams of sunlight. With three pets and a big house that doesn't get dusted like it should, it was a lot! Within a few days, the dust was visibly reduced to just the smallest particles showing in the sunbeams, and the reduced collection of dust on surfaces proves it works. It really does detect smells and kick on. The review talking about her kids "testing" it? Yup. Some reviewers complained about it running on high for 15 mins when it first turns on and then saying the air was clean. Yes, it does that, but it's supposed to. I think it's looking for any big issues and testing the air. If the quality is passable it will then switch to low. It doesn't mean your air is completely clean. It just means there is no massive bad smells to clean at that moment. Trust me, if someone uses our guest bath (next to where the unit sits) or when I'm cooking something stinky, it kicks on until the smell is gone. I'm very happy with this unit and would buy it again!

title: Working like what it seems to claim
content: Only had this for probably 5 days. At first I thought the air sensor doesn‚Äôt seem to work. It seemEd to work from bad to good air within 5 minutes without variation when I moved it so I did an experiment. I opened our second floor sliding doors and wow, I guess the air outside is pretty bad because it took a looong time probably almost 20 minutes when I kept the door opened. It was 7-8 feet away from it. I live in Southern California and I have a backyard with plenty of greens on it. I still have to add more though. Anyway, even after I closed the doors, it worked pretty much a long time than before I opened it. About 12 minutes before it turned from red to green, which meant good air. I was beginning to smell kinda something awful from it so I decided to take the filters out and put it under the sun, 10 minutes on each side. When I put it back, red to green was less than 5 minutes. So I‚Äôm thinking the sunlight killed sine bacteria I hope.

title: Verified Purchase
content: What a well designed machine!  Folks, I've had asthma my entire life.  It is so severe that I have suffered a full respiratory arrest.  We really tested this machine's performance.  During the fires of 2018, ten western states were on fire.  My state was no acception, we had 11 here one which was up our nearby canyon.  For 15 years, I've used a high quality filtration system on my furnaces blower.  It has helped.  But it didn't take long to figure out it just wasn't enough from the heavy smoke.  The humidifier for my oxygen concentrator would become turbid with smoke particles in just days after replenishing the water.  I use two different inhalers for my asthma.  The first one is used for maintenance to help me from having an attack and the 2nd is an emergency inhaler.  The first inhaler does a great job, most times, and my emergency inhaler usually expires before it has any use.  During the fires of 2018, I was using my emergency inhaler each day.  And my chest felt like a very heavy person was standing on it, even turning up the oxygen by 50% didn't help much.  In desperation we had to find something which would bridge the gap.  After doing some research on what makes a great air purifier, this one fit the bill.  No sooner had we got this machine filtering the air, I noticed that on the second day of using this air purifier that the "fat lady" was getting off my chest.  Somewhere between day 3 or 4 the pain in my chest was gone.  We like it so much we purchased a second machine.  The replacement filters are low cost and very easy to change.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!  If we could give this machine a 10 star rating we would.  SIMPLY AWESOME!!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2019

title: Kinda Useless Air Quality Sensor
content: My family members all suffer with allergies and I also suffer from sinus issues.  I initially started researching air filters for my 3 year old son‚Äôs room as his allergies keep him up coughing all night.  Makes it hard on the whole family.  I purchased a smaller air purifier for his room which is different from this one, but purchased this one for our living area (living room/dining/kitchen).  I am extremely happy with both.  This one is just simply amazing.  My husband was kind of ‚Äúoh whatever‚Äù about getting this for the house.  Skeptical maybe???  Lol.  I got it in the late morning and placed it in our main living area.  My husband came home from work 6 hours later.  He initially just looked at the purifier, then carried on about his evening.  Of importance is the fact that we have 4 cats and one dog....the cats he is allergic to.  Usually he comes home and starts having problems with allergies right away, itchy watery eyes, sneezing, coughing, and excessive phlegm.  He looked at me and said, ‚Äúcall me crazy, but I think that thing actually works!‚Äù  I was so happy.  We have all but rid ourselves from our allergy symptoms with this purifier!  It is a life changer.  I will be purchasing 2 more when my budget allows.  One for our bedroom and one for our kids playroom downstairs.  The area I am treating in my house is about 700 sq ft and it does beautifully.  I move it to the others areas of the house and run it after cleaning to get all the stirred up crud out of the air.  So very pleased with this unit!

title: Verified Purchase
content: The review said it was scam because after powering off and unplugging the unit while the air quality was on green (good) and then immediately plugging it back in and restarting it the air quality light was on red (bad). The reviewer was asking how could the air quality get so bad in one minute therefore calling it a scam.  What the reviewer failed to realize (and is clearly stated in the manual) is that whenever the unit is powered on it automatically starts off as red by default. After a few minutes it will "read" the air quality and adjust accordingly.  I think the reviewer should wait a few months and then check the filters see how much if any of the dust or particles the unit caught.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2021
